sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import TabPane from "./TabPane"; import Navigator from "./Navigator"; import AddScore_Component from "./AddScore"; import {fnExcelReport} from '../../../Export/Excel' export class MainScore extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state ={ loading:true, data : this.props.results } } async fnExcel() { fnExcelReport() } renderTableData() { return this.state.data.map((scores, index) => { const { MANHANVIEN, NHANVIEN_ID, HOTEN, NGAYSINH, ID_SV_MH, ID_Mon_Lophoc, tinhdiem_tbc, hoclai, Lan_Hoc, Ghichu, Diem_Trungbinh, Diem_Trungbinh2, TB_KT, tx1, tx2, tx3, tx4, tx5, dk1, dk2, dk3, dk4, dk5, dk6, dk7, dk8, kt1, kt2, } = scores; return ( {MANHANVIEN} {NHANVIEN_ID} {HOTEN} {NGAYSINH} {ID_SV_MH} {ID_Mon_Lophoc} {tinhdiem_tbc} {hoclai} {Lan_Hoc} {Ghichu} {Diem_Trungbinh} {Diem_Trungbinh2} {TB_KT} {tx1} {tx2} {tx3} {tx4} {tx5} {dk1} {dk2} {dk3} {dk4} {dk5} {dk6} {dk7} {dk8} {kt1} {kt2} ) }) } renderTableHeader() { const header = Object.keys(this.state.data[0]) const newheader = header.unshift('tools') return header.map((key, index) => {key.toUpperCase()} ) } renderModalAdd(){ return (
{/* Modal */}
{/* Modal content*/}
) } render() { return ( <>
{this.props.header}
Tools
  • Print
  • Save as PDF
  • Export to Excel
{this.renderTableHeader()} {this.renderTableData()}
{this.renderModalAdd()}
); } } export default MainScore;
